FAQ-q1: Mi gotta add all da bruddas every time, mon?
FAQ-r1: Nah mon, once be enough. Da site remember who ya be rollin' wit.
FAQ-q2: Nuttin' happen when I smash da Split button.
FAQ-r2: Could be da dark mojo (extensions), mon. Turn 'em off. If still broken, go shout on da GitHub.
FAQ-q3: Ya be savin’ me QR magics on da net?
FAQ-r3: Neva, mon! All da mojo stay in ya hut (local storage).
FAQ-q4: Can I see me bruddas and bills on a new totem (computer)?
FAQ-r4: Not now, mon. Da spirits ain't allow dat yet.
FAQ-q6: Me Foodora ting lookin’ weird, an’ it don’t work.
FAQ-r6: Dark mojo again, mon. Try da other button or silence dem browser spirits.
import-gpt-description:
1. Click da 'Get prompt' ting, ya see it?
It go straight inna ya clipboard, no hustle.
2. Head over to ChatGPT an’ drop it in — don’t send nothin' yet, mi fren.
3. Tek a screenshot a di order, Ctrl + Shift + S style, yeh?
Drop di screenshot inna GPT chat an’ press send, bless.
4. Copy di answer GPT fling back, paste it roun’ ere.
5. Mash dat ‘Process’ button an’ yuh good to go.
settings-qr-info: Leave space 'round da QR so da totems (devices) can see it clear.
empty-text-area-error: Ain’t nuttin’ in da box, mon!
missing-name-or-price: Tell me wot an’ how much, mon.
